author: Source: Campaignseries.co.uk
title: The amazing story of Morning Glory: 20 years of Oasis and their famous album - Campaignseries.co.uk
text:
In front of 300 fans - some who'd queued for five hours - the Manchester group debuted their second album, Morning Glory, in a secret free gig, although Liam later admitted he was too drunk to remember the words. On its 20th anniversary, Oasis may have disbanded but What's The Story remains one of the defining albums of the 90s.
 Campaignseries.co.uk.
